pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.5: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchanti ovādampi na yācantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo uposathampi na pucchissanti ovādampi na yācissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.11.1: “Anvaddhamāsaṁ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā—uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca. Taṁ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:2.4: dve uposathā— cātuddasiko ca pannarasiko ca.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:2.7: “Uposathampi na pucchissāmi ovādampi na yācissāmī”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
